question: The Palayakkarar system was put in place in Tamil Nadu by ______.
Velunachiyar and her daughter were under the protection of ______ for eight years.
Bennerman deputed ______ to convey his message, asking Kattabomman to surrender.
Kattabomman was hanged to death at ______.
The Rebellion of Marudhu Brothers was categorized in the British records as the ______.
______ was declared the new Sultan by the rebels in Vellore Fort.
